Meld into the shadows.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
Enter stealth for <font color='#00aaef'>12</font> sec.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
While hidden, movement speed increases by <font color='#00aaef'>21%</font>, spirit recovery increases by <font color='#00aaef'>2</font>, and your attacks stun targets for <font color='#00aaef'>1.5</font> sec.

Flip backwards and summons a mirror image.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
Shortly after casting, Your clone explodes shortly after casting, dealing <font color='#00aaef'>28%</font> damage to nearby enemies.

Deals an additional <font color='#00aaef'>14%</font> damage per sec for <font color='#00aaef'>4</font> sec.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>

This skill can be used to interrupt other skills.
